description: The details of any court orders that are made and can be subject of future proceedings e.g. breach.  Orders are collected from shared results

id.description: The generated identifier of the order

courtOrderSubject.description: The defendant that is the subject of the order

label.description: The label of the type of order made

orderDate.description: The date that the order was made

startDate.description: The date that the order commenced, typically the date that the order was made

endDate.description: The date that the order completes, typically calculated based on a duration result.  The absence of an end date determines that the order remains active indefinately

orderingCourt.description: The court centre that made the order

orderingHearingId.description: The reference to the court hearing or sjp session that made the order

isSJPOrder.description: Indicates if the order has been made based on a decision at an SJP session

canBeSubjectOfBreachProceedings.description: Indicates if the order can be the subject of future breach proceedings

canBeSubjectOfVariationProceedings.description: Indicates if the order can be the subject of future variation proceedings

courtOrderOffences.description: The offences that were matters heard when the court order was made
